title: How to Space Clear a Room

steps.headline: De-clutter the room you are about to space clear, in other words, make it as simple and clean as possible.
Take as long as necessary to calm and center yourself.
steps.description: Take time and think carefully about what you want this space clearing to achieve, such as a better, healthier atmosphere, improved sleep and overall health or maybe the start of a happier, calmer, more fulfilled time of your life; it is completely personal to you.

steps.headline: Do this by yourself, making sure that children and pets are not present, as they have a tendency to add to clutter!
Wear comfortable clothing and if possible stay barefoot.
Open all the windows to allow fresh air to circulate as you work.
Optionally call in whatever angels or divine beings are appropriate to you and your situation.
steps.description: Obviously this step is only useful if you believe in such beings.

steps.headline: Use bells or cymbals in each corner of the room and in the center to shake up and disperse the stagnant, stale energy.
steps.description: If you don’t have access to a bell, a metal pot and spoon is just fine!

steps.headline: Light your smudge stick or incense carefully and walk around the room, holding a fireproof container under the stick to catch any ash.
steps.description: Many believe that that tracing the figure 8 can bring in an extra divine element.

steps.headline: Finish the space clearing, with either a bowl of salt placed in the middle of the room you have just cleared, or you can place small bowls of salt in each corner to absorb any residual negative energy.
Light a candle, at the same time stating your wish for the space clearing.
steps.description: Thank all the divine beings who have helped you, if they did.

steps.headline: Place your flowers where you can enjoy them and relax.

Take time and think carefully about what you want this space clearing to achieve, such as a better, healthier atmosphere, improved sleep and overall health or maybe the start of a happier, calmer, more fulfilled time of your life; it is completely personal to you. Do this by yourself, making sure that children and pets are not present, as they have a tendency to add to clutter!  Wear comfortable clothing and if possible stay barefoot.  Open all the windows to allow fresh air to circulate as you work.  Optionally call in whatever angels or divine beings are appropriate to you and your situation. Obviously this step is only useful if you believe in such beings. Use bells or cymbals in each corner of the room and in the center to shake up and disperse the stagnant, stale energy. If you don’t have access to a bell, a metal pot and spoon is just fine! Light your smudge stick or incense carefully and walk around the room, holding a fireproof container under the stick to catch any ash. Many believe that that tracing the figure 8 can bring in an extra divine element. Finish the space clearing, with either a bowl of salt placed in the middle of the room you have just cleared, or you can place small bowls of salt in each corner to absorb any residual negative energy.  Light a candle, at the same time stating your wish for the space clearing. Thank all the divine beings who have helped you, if they did. Place your flowers where you can enjoy them and relax.
